name: Crap-U-Loose
description: An action packed game full of fun, crazy battles and...well pigeons. Test your fight skills in different settings each round. This is a multiplayer game and can be played using the keyboard together. Attack and take the lead over your opponent. Avoid being attacked yourself and any other obstacle. This game was imagined and brought to fruition by two friends, one character and background artist and one Unreal Engine coder.
